short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy ChatGPT conversations to add to Github commits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows copying prompt(s) and answer(s) from ChatGPT and automatically converting to markdown, allowing you to paste them directly into Github. The intended use is to comment on a commit with the portion of the chat that contributed to that commit.
